cleansers.overview: A gentle, hydrating cream cleanser that effectively removes dirt, oil, and makeup without stripping the skin's natural moisture barrier. Perfect for dry and sensitive skin types.
cleansers.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Carbomer, Dimethicone, MVA/MA Decadiene Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Dipotassium Phosphate, Tocoph
cleansers.howTo:
Apply cleanser to dry skin with fingertips
Massage gently for 30-60 seconds
Rinse with lukewarm water and pat dry
cleansers.whyEffective: Contains ceramides and hyaluronic acid that cleanse while maintaining the skin's natural moisture barrier.

cleansers.productName: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Cleanser
cleansers.overview: A gentle foaming cleanser designed for sensitive skin that effectively removes impurities while respecting the skin's natural barrier. Ideal for normal to combination skin types.
cleansers.ingredients: Aqua/Water, Coco-Betaine, Propanediol, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Niacinamide, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Carbomer, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Capryloyl Glycine
cleansers.howTo:
Apply to damp skin and work into light lather
Massage for 30 seconds focusing on entire face
Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water
cleansers.whyEffective: Formulated with niacinamide and ceramides to cleanse effectively while maintaining skin balance and reducing irritation.

cleansers.overview: An ultra-light cleansing oil that transforms into a rich foam to effectively remove makeup, sunscreen, and impurities without leaving an oily residue. Perfect for oily and combination skin.
cleansers.ingredients: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, PEG-8 Diisostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Water, Isopropyl Myristate, Hexylene Glycol, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, PEG-4 Laurate, Carbomer, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate
cleansers.howTo:
Apply to wet skin and work into rich foam
Massage for 45 seconds focusing on T-zone
Rinse thoroughly and use twice daily
cleansers.whyEffective: Oil-based formula effectively dissolves excess sebum and makeup while being gentle enough for daily use.

cleansers.overview: A sulfate-free daily cleanser with polyhydroxy acid that gently cleanses and exfoliates while maintaining skin balance. Ideal for combination skin that needs gentle yet effective cleansing.
cleansers.ingredients: Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Polyhydroxy Acid Complex, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance
cleansers.howTo:
Apply to damp skin and create light foam
Massage gently for 30 seconds, focus on T-zone
Rinse well with lukewarm water
cleansers.whyEffective: Polyhydroxy acid gently exfoliates while being sulfate-free, making it perfect for balancing combination skin needs.
